dialogue: When she opens them, the two were suddenly
in the middle of a Militia camp. But...
Oh no...
The warning was too late. The attack had already begun.
Wait a minute, those ships...
Spirit recognizes the ships that were bombarding
the camp as models that attacked her.
So it was the Empire...
But Spirit is brought back to reality
when some Empire forces notice her ship
suddenly appear out of nowhere.
Spirit grabs Tom and dives for cover. Bullets pass overhead.
Great. Now what're we gonna do?
Mrrrrrrrrrnnnnnnnnn...
Tom began glowing, and suddenly all the Empire ships
and troops rise into the air. They try to move,
attack, do anything. But they can't.
Mmnnnnnnnnnrrrrrrrrrrrrr...
Tom brings them all together into a sphere.
Then, he increased his power, and crushes them.
Their screams fill the air as their bones break
and organs rupture. The Militia forces could only
watch the destruction as it happened.
Once the screams finally die down, Tom drops
the ball of bodies and metals from the air.
Mnnnpp...Mrrn?
Tom was exhausted after his display of power.
He turns to Spirit, looking for praise.
But she had none to give.
Instead, she felt sick at what she just watched.
She turns around and empties her stomach.
Blergh...
The Militia soldiers, meanwhile, reorganized their forces and
assessed damages when they realized the power
from before wasn't targetting any of them.
